title: Native bears
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions, Keith Hutchison and William Horne
brief_description: A simple study of the life and habits of the koalas and wombats, both of which have been called native bears. They are compared with the marsupial tiger and the opossum. Presents the animals in their natural surroundings; wombats drinking at a stream; koalas feeding on gum leaves with their young in their pouches.
